722013f.text:
Orchard Street, at, adjoining and south of the S.E. corner of Rivington Street, showing the push cart market, a local feature of
this area.
About 1925.
Ewing Galloway.
722013f.folder: Orchard Street & Rivington Street, Manhattan, NY

722981f-a.text:
Rivington Street, west from Orchard to Allen Streets, showing a portion of the over-flow of the push cart market on Orchard Street. Buildings appearing on the left are Nos. 83 to 69,of which the fartherest two (Nos. 75 and 73-69) have been demolished in the widening of Allen Street. Note on Allen Street, a pillar and stairway of the Second Ave.
Elevated Line which has a station at this point.
About 1925.
Ewing GalloWay.
722981f-a.folder: Rivington Street & Orchard Street, Manhattan, NY

722012f-a.text:
138-140 Orchard Street, at and adjoining the S.E. corner
of Rivington Street.
April 28, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.

722018f-b.text:
(1)
Orchard Street, east side, north from but not including Rivington, to and including East Houston Streets. The view shows
the pushcart peddler's market on Orchard Street.
May S, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, alightly northward.
May 5. 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same, as seen from the N.E. corner of Rivington Street.
January 20, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
